mapper.sql: dept_id AS deptId, parent_id AS parentId, ancestors, dept_name AS deptName, order_num AS orderNum, leader, phone, email, status, del_flag AS delFlag, create_by AS createBy, create_time AS createTime, update_by AS updateBy, update_time AS updateTime
select d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d
mapper.select: select d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, (select dept_name from sys_dept where dept_id = d.parent_id) parent_name from sys_dept d where d.dept_id = #{deptId}

select concat(d.dept_id, d.dept_name) as dept_name from sys_dept d left join sys_role_dept rd on d.dept_id = rd.dept_id where d.del_flag = '0' and rd.role_id = #{roleId} order by d.parent_id, d.order_num
select count(1) from sys_user where dept_id = #{deptId} and del_flag = '1'
